bioconda.name: bioconductor-gnet2
bioconda.summary: Constructing gene regulatory networks from expression data through functional module inference

biotools.summary:
An R package for constructing gene regulatory networks from transcriptomic data.

Gene regulatory network modeling tool (GNET2).

GNET2 has been developed and used by the Bioinformatics, Data Mining and Machine Learning Laboratory (BDM) . Help from every community member is very valuable to make the package better for everyone. Checkout the Lab Page.
